SRCNN code (model + SRCNN.m + shave.m + modcrop.m) original page:
http://mmlab.ie.cuhk.edu.hk/projects/SRCNN.html

Registration (LKOFlow) original page:
https://users.soe.ucsc.edu/~milanfar/software/superresolution.html

Alpaca dataset original page:
https://users.soe.ucsc.edu/~milanfar/software/sr-datasets.html
